Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the methods, properties, and events of the <font face="courier new">GroupBox</font> control against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Property used to set or get a value indicating if the control can respond to user's action.
Property used to specify or retrieve the flat style of the control.
Event that occurs when the style of control is modified.
Method used to display the control to the user.
Event that occurs when the control is resized.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)–(4), (B)–(1), (C)–(5), (D)–(2), and (E)-(3).
